mapper.select: select study_name, price, pay_date from payment_complete P join members M on P.fk_useremail = M.useremail where useremail = #{useremail}
select coupon_name, issuedate, expi_date from coupon C join members M on C.coupon_num = M.fk_coupon_num where useremail = #{useremail}

select * from ( select fk_study_num, M.useremail from wishlist W join members M on W.fk_useremail = M.useremail )V1 JOIN ( select * from study S join members L on S.fk_useremail = L.useremail )V2 ON V1.fk_study_num = V2.study_num where V1.useremail = #{useremail}

select * from ( select fk_study_num, M.useremail from payment_complete P join members M on P.fk_useremail = M.useremail )V1 JOIN ( select * from study S join members L on S.fk_useremail = L.useremail )V2 ON V1.fk_study_num = V2.study_num where V1.useremail = #{useremail}

select name, useremail, hp from ( select M.name, useremail, M.hp, P.fk_study_num from payment_complete P join members M on P.fk_useremail = M.useremail )V1 JOIN ( select * from study )V2 ON V1.fk_study_num = V2.study_num where study_num = #{study_num}
select * from study S join members M on S.fk_useremail = M.useremail where useremail = #{useremail}
mapper.update: update members set status = 0 where useremail = #{useremail}
